txt.en: Within the ruins of Stormwall, the vacant lair of Etterfang remains vastly unexplored….\n\nYour mission is to collect uncovered treasures from within the ruins of Stormwall.
You have been tasked with collecting uncovered treasures from within the ruins of Stormwall.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Stormwall. The worms there have been digging and have unknowingly uncovered hidden treasures! Had the group not run short on time and supplies, they would have recovered the items. We must return to collect as many of the uncovered treasures that we can.

'If we do not collect those treasures, the Frost-bound Hobgoblins will surely find them soon!'
At low health, monsters in this mission will attempt to end their own life to damage and apply a fear effect to those nearby.
Your mission is to collect uncovered treasures from within the ruins of Stormwall.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Stormwall.
'Well done! You have done well in collecting all of these treasures! For once, I thank the Frost-horde for finding them for us!'
